capabilities.capability: The transformation allows IAP users to run a set of mathematical aggregate functions on an array of numbers. The aggregate functions consist of Sum, Product, Maximum, Minimum, Range, Count, Arithmetic Mean, Geometric Mean, Harmonic Mean, Median, Mode, Standard Deviation, and Variance

outputs.name: sum
outputs.description: Summation of the items in the array

outputs.name: product
outputs.description: Product of the items in the array

outputs.name: maximum
outputs.description: The highest value in the array

outputs.name: minumum
outputs.description: The lowest value in the array

outputs.name: range
outputs.description: Difference between the lowest and highest values

outputs.name: count
outputs.description: Number of items used for the calculations

outputs.name: arithmeticMean
outputs.description: The sum of all the numbers in the array divided by the count of all numbers in the array

outputs.name: geometricMean
outputs.description: The average value which signifies the central tendency of the numbers in the arrays by taking the root of the product of their values

outputs.name: harmonicMean
outputs.description: The reciprocal of the average of the reciprocals

outputs.name: median
outputs.description: Middle value of the items in the array

outputs.name: mode
outputs.description: The numbers that appear most often in the array

outputs.name: modeFrequency
outputs.description: The number of times the most frequently occurring numbers appear

outputs.name: standardDeviation
outputs.description: Measure of the amount of variation or dispersion of the items in the array

outputs.name: variance
outputs.description: Measure of how far the array items are spread out from the arithmetic mean

outputs.name: valuesIgnored
outputs.description: Items of the array that were either not a number or a parsable string and were ignored from all calculations

outputs.name: valuesUsed
outputs.description: Items of the array that were either a number or a parsable string and were used for all calculations

outputs.name: valuesUsed-converted
outputs.description: The parsed form of all items in valuesUsed

name: Aggregate Functions for Arrays - IAP
overview: Run a set of mathematical aggregate functions on an array of numbers
